channel.title: Query Result Datasource Doesn't Exist
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
When trying to create a new data source, I can't find the option to choose "Query Results" like the documentation state (I am an admin on the server and can add all other data sources): https://redash.io/help/user-guide/querying/query-results-data-source
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: Latest * Browser/OS: * How did you install Redash:

item.title: Query Result Datasource Doesn't Exist
item.dc:creator: souki
item.description:
Hello Jesse,

I think that i have found the solution

thanks for reponse

Read full topic

item.title: Query Result Datasource Doesn't Exist
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Can you share an example of what isn’t working?

Read full topic

item.title: Query Result Datasource Doesn't Exist
item.dc:creator: souki
item.description:
Hello , When trying to create a new data seource from my query results, normally the connection is successful but the problem when i try to use the content of the query, it doesn’t show me anything

please can someone show me how to do this

Read full topic

item.title: Query Result Datasource Doesn't Exist
item.dc:creator: arikfr
item.description:
Partially our fault too, as we didn’t update the AMIs in some time. You can find the upgrade instructions here:
https://redash.io/help/open-source/admin-guide/how-to-upgrade

Read full topic

item.title: Query Result Datasource Doesn't Exist
item.dc:creator: nechmads
item.description:
Hi Arik. Sorry. My bad. We used the AWS image and didn’t realize it includes an older version.

Read full topic

item.title: Query Result Datasource Doesn't Exist
item.dc:creator: arikfr
item.description:
Hi Shahar!

What version of Redash do you use? Query Results was introduced in V3.

Read full topic
